statements: DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE technician_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE system_name = 'HVAC System' AND maintenance_type = 'Filter Replacement'
DELETE FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE building_name = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM maintenance_records WHERE technician_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE building_name = 'Office Building' AND system_type = 'HVAC';
DELETE FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE system_id = 101 AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM maintenance_record WHERE technician_id = 201 AND status = 'In Progress';
DELETE FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE system_id = 1 AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM maintenance_records WHERE record_id = 10 OR (completion_date IS NULL AND technician_name = 'John Doe');
